Detailed Description

Offers a column to be used in a wxListCtrl. Facilitates sorting.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum wxExColumn::wxExColumnType

Column types.

Enumerator:
COL_INT 

integer, should be different from 0, as inverse is used by sorting!

COL_DATE 

date

COL_FLOAT 

float

COL_STRING 

string

wxExColumn::wxExColumn ( const wxString &  name = wxEmptyString,
wxExColumnType  type = COL_INT,
int  width = 0 
)

Constructor.

Default width is set by the column type. If you specify a width, that one is used.
